Title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
Writer: Akira Toriyama (original manga "Dragon Ball"), Takao Koyama (screenplay)
Actors: Bin Shimada, Masako Nozawa, Ryô Horikawa, Iemasa Kayumi
Plot: Vegeta is lured to the planet New Vegeta by a group of Saiyan survivors in hopes that he will be the king of their new planet. But when he finds that they have ulterior motives of universal...
